ThingDef.label: cattleman
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern single-action revolver. It's not very powerful, but has a decent range for a pistol and is quick on the draw.

ThingDef.label: break-action revolver
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern break-action revolver. It's not very powerful, but has a decent range for a pistol and a relatively quick reload.

ThingDef.label: percussion revolver
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern percussion-lock revolver. It's quite powerful, has a decent range and is quick on the draw.

ThingDef.label: rebel revolver
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern single-action revolver. It's not very powerful, but has a decent range for a pistol and is quick on the draw.

ThingDef.label: double-action revolver
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern double-action revolver. It's not very powerful, but has a decent range for a pistol and has a decent rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: lever-action pistol
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern lever-action pistol. It's not very powerful, but has a decent range for a pistol and has a decent rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: broomhandle pistol
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range, but is quick to fire.

ThingDef.label: flintlock pistol
ThingDef.description: Ancient pistol design. Popular with admirals and pirates alike. Good stopping power, but slow to fire and has bad accuracy at range.

ThingDef.label: percussion pistol
ThingDef.description: Ancient pistol design. Good stopping power, but slow to fire and has bad accuracy at range.

ThingDef.label: bolt-action pistol
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern bolt-action pistol. Medium range, and low fire rate.

ThingDef.label: harlow's revolver
ThingDef.description: Allegedely the revolver used by the legendary 'Harlow'.

ThingDef.label: coach gun
ThingDef.description: An ancient design of double barrelled shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range, and slow rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: sawed-off coach gun
ThingDef.description: An ancient design of double barrelled shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range, and slow rate of fire. Sacrifices accuracy at long range for being more wieldy.

ThingDef.label: break-action shotgun
ThingDef.description: An ancient design of double barrelled shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range, and slow rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: trench gun
ThingDef.description: An ancient design of pump shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range.

ThingDef.label: lever-action shotgun
ThingDef.description: An ancient design of lever-action shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range, decent rate-of-fire.

ThingDef.label: sawed-off lever-action shotgun
ThingDef.description: An ancient design of lever-action shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range, decent rate-of-fire. Sacrifices accuracy at long range for being more wieldy.

ThingDef.label: mare's leg shotgun
ThingDef.description: An ancient design of lever-action shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range, decent rate-of-fire. Sacrifices accuracy at long range for being generally awesome.

ThingDef.label: musket rifle
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern musket rifle. Has a decent range, but a very low fire rate. When it finds its target it packs quite the punch.

ThingDef.label: bayoneted musket rifle
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern musket rifle with a bayonet. Has a decent range, but a very low fire rate. When it finds its target it packs quite the punch.

ThingDef.label: decorated musket rifle
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern musket rifle, decorated by First Nation tribes. Has a decent range, but a very low fire rate. When it finds its target it packs quite the punch.

ThingDef.label: percussion rifle
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern percussion lock rifle. Decent range, and low fire rate.

ThingDef.label: breechblock rifle
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern breech-block rifle. With its long range, and somewhat low fire rate, it is good for the aspiring marksman.

ThingDef.label: repeating rifle
ThingDef.description: A general-purpose lever-action rifle for field or urban combat. It has good range, decent power, and good accuracy.

ThingDef.label: decorated repeating rifle
ThingDef.description: A general-purpose lever-action rifle for field or urban combat, decorated by First Nation tribes. It has good range, decent power, and good accuracy.

ThingDef.label: bolt-action sniper rifle
ThingDef.description: Ancient pattern bolt-action rifle with sniper optics. Very long range, good accuracy and power, low rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: breechblock sniper rifle
ThingDef.description: Ancient pattern breechblock rifle with long-range optics. Long range, good accuracy and power, very low rate of fire.
